channel.title: Jak and Daxter collection
channel.description: Anyone played them? The reason I ask is because I used to play them for my ps2 and I just bought the ps3 HD collection. Kinda on a kick :P

item.title: Jak and Daxter collection
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Dunder Mifflin:

That , kingdom hearts, and ratchet and clank comPleted ps2

I had both of those series as well, up your arsenal was my favorite Ratchet and Clank. The first Kingdom Hearts was the best.

[quote=“Acorn_, post:6, topic:442393”]My favorite is definitely #3 but that’s because you can visit the wastelands and other new places.
I love how in every game (except combat racing) they recap old places you visited in the older versions like coming back to jak’s old tree house thing from jak and daxter 1.[/quote]

Yeah, they definitely played it out well.

Read full topic

item.title: Jak and Daxter collection
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

vManlyMan:

Sounds familiar. I think my friend gave me one of them for PSP before, but I never really played it much.

The PSP ones were no where near as good as the first 3 on PS2.

item.title: Jak and Daxter collection
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

My favorite is definitely #3 but that’s because you can visit the wastelands and other new places.
I love how in every game (except combat racing) they recap old places you visited in the older versions like coming back to jak’s old tree house thing from jak and daxter 1.

Read full topic

item.title: Jak and Daxter collection
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:2, topic:442393”]My all time favorite games forever and always c’:
I’ve played jack 1, jack 2, jack 3, combat racing and the daxter game for psp. I used to play them on the ps2 like 24/7 as a kid even though I’d beat the games hundreds of times and probably memorized every aspect of it aswell.[/quote]

I know XD, I just finished the first one in HD and started the second one. I bought them all individually for my ps2 but for some reason my memory card glitched and refused to save combat racing. Personally my favorite was always 2.

[quote=“n10si t, post:3, topic:442393”]jak*

loved these games though[/quote]

Thanks I did begin to think after I posted that it was Jak. Just in a hurry out the door

vManlyMan:

Sounds familiar. I think my friend gave me one of them for PSP before, but I never really played it much.

Definitely recommended.

Read full topic
